name: Clockwork Scorpion
description: The Clockwork Scorpion is a large mechanical creature with formidable combat abilities, characterized by its sharp claws and stinger.
memorable: Its ability to inflict hallucinations and unconsciousness makes it a unique threat in combat.
goals: Undertakes tasks and battles as intended by its creator.
relations: Can be related to other constructs or creations of its maker.
environment: Typically found in areas associated with its creator or industrial locations.
strengths: Possesses high Strength and Constitution, making it a powerful melee combatant with significant durability.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma indicate it is incapable of complex strategies outside combat.
attacks: Can perform a series of attacks including claw grapples and a deadly sting that inflicts poison and other debilitating effects.
most_powerful_ability: Sting attack delivers poison damage and has various debilitating effects based on Constitution saving throws.
senses: Possesses darkvision and tremorsense within 60 feet, along with a passive perception of 15.
skills: Average perception skills with a +1 modifier indicate a basic awareness of its environment.
additional_information: Immune to numerous conditions, enhancing its defensive capabilities.
Doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, making it tireless in tasks.
Magic Resistance grants it advantages against spells.
test_queries: large construct immune to many conditions
scorpion monster with acid spray attack
